fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_notes: Mixed majoritarian systems were coded as majoritarian systems. Category 3: Other was introduced for data release 7.
fxInfo_question: What was the electoral system used in this election for the lower or unicameral chamber of the legislature?

fxInfo_responses.value: Other (e.g. single non-transferable voting, limited voting)

fxInfo_sources: Chronicle of Parliamentary Elections (IPU); IDEA; Nohlen et al. (1999, 2002, 2005, 2010); Colomer (2016).
